original_text: For there shall be a sowing of peace. The vine shall give its fruit, and the ground shall give its produce, and the heavens shall give their dew. And I will cause the remnant of this people to possess all these things.
korean_text: 곧 평강의 씨앗을 얻을 것이라 포도나무가 열매를 맺으며 땅이 산물을 내며 하늘은 이슬을 내리리니 내가 이 남은 백성으로 이 모든 것을 누리게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For there shall be a sowing of peace.
sentences.korean_translation: 평화의 씨를 뿌릴 때가 올 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The vine shall give its fruit,
and the ground shall give its produce,
and the heavens shall give their dew.
And I will cause the remnant of this people

sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것을 차지하게 할 것입니다.
